casebody.data:
Submitted on record and briefs May 31, affirmed June 9, 1972 CITY OF PORTLAND, Respondent, v. WALLACE, Appellant. (No. C-71-08-2543) 497 P2d 683 Oscar D. Howlett, Portland, filed the brief for appellant. Lee Johnson, Attorney General, and John W. Os-burn, Solicitor General, Salem, filed the brief for respondent.

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Langtry and Thornton, Judges.

PER CURIAM.

ORS 19.180.
